snippet: ENGEL--Sylvia Goldberg. We sadly mourn the passing of our dear friend Sunny. We cherish our DPhiE friendship of over 70 years. Heartfelt condolences to Sydney and family. Caryl, Charlotte, Elaine, Eleanor, Lola, Margery, Phyllis, Selma. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ENGEL--Sylvia Goldberg. We sadly mourn the passing of our dear friend Sunny. We cherish our DPhiE friendship of over 70 years. Heartfelt condolences to Sydney and family. Caryl, Charlotte, Elaine, Eleanor, Lola, Margery, Phyllis, Selma. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ENGEL, SYLVIA GOLDBERG
